alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 8:35PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CHOCTAW AND NORTHWESTERN WINSTON COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM CST... At 835 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mccool, or 13 miles southwest of Ackerman, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Weir and Mcmillan around 840 PM CST. Louisville and Ackerman around 845 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central, northeastern and east central Mississippi.
